name: Space Rubble
description:
Hi, this is my first attempt at creating a 2D game using the Godot game engine. It's an Asteroids clone with a few additional bits and bobs. I took on this small project in order to understand physics within the engine. 

Hopefully this will be a stepping stone to larger and more elaborate projects. As I mentioned I used Godot, the C# edition. I also created all the game assets myself.

Please feel free to drop me a comment or suggestion. I'm always open to feedback.
